frontmatter.title: CCOSS 2020
frontmatter.description: Meshery is a tool that allows you to deploy, configure, measure, operate, and modify multiple service meshes (Istio, Linkerd, etc.). In this workshop, you will learn what a service mesh is and how Meshery can help you assess the landscape of service meshes available in the market.
